[00:00.00]Nevada - Vicetone/Cozi Zuehlsdorff
[00:19.02]I've been painting every fence I know
[00:22.92]Every color bleeds into the same
[00:26.64]Cause before you go and walk away
[00:30.51]Yeah you better know where you're going
[00:33.37]Hey yeah hey yeah
[00:38.23]You're a wanderer just like me
[00:41.16]Hey yeah hey yeah
[00:45.98]Yeah you better know where you're going
[01:01.50]Yeah you better know where you're going

[ti:Nevada]
[ar:Vicetone/Cozi Zuehlsdorff]
[al:Nevada]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:19.02]每处险阻我都铭记心中
[00:22.92]现已化作经验教训
[00:26.64]在你踏上征途之前
[00:30.51]我希望你清楚你的方向
[00:33.37]//
[00:38.23]你就像我一样是个流浪者
